title: Lentil
brief_description: A boy and his harmonica save the day. Definitive illustrations give full dimension to each character and represent delightful vignettes of a typical American town. Based on the book by Robert McCloskey.
description: A boy and his harmonica save the day. Definitive illustrations give full dimension to each character and represent delightful vignettes of a typical American town. Based on the book by Robert McCloskey.
